title: What are main differences between descriptive and ordinary essay? - Quora

response.answer_text: In an ordinary essay one either explains the experience he/she had been through or simply explains the story based n the facts while in descriptive essay one can easily write about any person whether he/she is from your family or a friend or any character of a play. The most important thing is that you should start with making a statement about his/her character and then you should explain the qualities he/she possesses then make a closing remark. If you require help in this regards then do turn t descriptive essay Where the Writers Go to Write that provide professionals to individuals for help and tutoring. There experts are native who have full command over the language and had been helping students all over the globe for 5 years. Here is the link Descriptive Writing Essay Help
